data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
Atalanta's Luis Muriel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Crotone have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Crotone Crotone attack through Arkadiusz Reca. The finish is off target, however.
Federico Dionisi awards Atalanta a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Atalanta's Luis Muriel is on target but unsuccessful.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Federico Dionisi.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Atalanta.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Crotone Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo is caught offside.
In the minute 12, Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Federico Dionisi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Atalanta at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Federico Dionisi signals a Crotone throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 21, Crotone to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
Important block from the Crotone defence as Luis Muriel fires in a strike for Atalanta.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Crotone.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Alex Cordaz.
Crotone's Alex Cordaz is back in action after a slight knock.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Luis Muriel.
In the minute 26, That's a fine assist from Ruslan Malinovskyi.
Federico Dionisi awards the home team a throw-in.
Ruslan Malinovskyi of Atalanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Free kick Crotone.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
In the minute 31, Papu Gomez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atalanta.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Atalanta drives forward and Luis Muriel gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Atalanta's Hans Hateboer has been booked in Crotone.
It's now 0-2 in Crotone as Luis Muriel scores for Atalanta.
In the minute 38, Remo Freuler instrumental with a fine assist.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Federico Dionisi signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Atalanta's area.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Goal! Crotone reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Simeon Nwankwo.
Great play from Milos Vulic to set up the goal.
In the minute 42, Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Atalanta.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Crotone have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Federico Dionisi awards Crotone a goal kick.
At Stadio Ezio Scida the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Crotone in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stadio Ezio Scida.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Josip Ilicic is replacing Luis Muriel for Atalanta at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Papu Gomez with Duvan Zapata. This is the second substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
Free kick for Crotone in the half of Atalanta.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 49, Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luca Marrone (Crotone) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo is whistled for offside at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 51, Atalanta's Duvan Zapata gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Crotone defender.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Crotone.
In the minute 53, Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Crotone's Junior Messias misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 54, Federico Dionisi awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta are pushing forward but Hans Hateboer's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 60, Atalanta are coming forward and Duvan Zapata gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Stadio Ezio Scida, Rafael Toloi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Milos Vulic of Crotone smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 65, Throw-in Crotone.
Atalanta's Duvan Zapata has run offside.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 67, Atalanta attack but Ruslan Malinovskyi's header doesn't find the target.
Crotone have a goal kick.
The match at Stadio Ezio Scida has been interrupted briefly for a check on Hans Hateboer, who is down injured.
In the minute 68, Bosko Sutalo (Atalanta) has replaced the possibly injured Hans Hateboer.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Cristian Romero for Atalanta has been booked by Federico Dionisi and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Atalanta pushes forward through Ruslan Malinovskyi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Crotone.
Atalanta make their fourth substitution with Jose Luis Palomino replacing Cristian Romero.
In the minute 74, Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
Josip Ilicic for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Free kick in a good position for Atalanta!
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team replace Niccolo Zanellato with Luca Siligardi.
In the minute 78, Giovanni Stroppa is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Ezio Scida with Andrea Rispoli replacing Pedro Pereira.
Free kick Atalanta.
In the minute 80, Crotone drive upfield and Luca Siligardi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atalanta defender.
Crotone to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Federico Dionisi.
In the minute 82, Atalanta's Duvan Zapata misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Duvan Zapata's header is off-target for Atalanta.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Throw-in Crotone.
Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 84, Atalanta's Remo Freuler breaks free at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Crotone.
In the minute 85, Duvan Zapata for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Crotone have a goal kick.
Atalanta's Rafael Toloi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 86, Federico Dionisi awards Crotone a goal kick.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Crotone.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Atalanta.
Matteo Pessina is on a sub for Ruslan Malinovskyi for Atalanta.
Federico Dionisi will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Federico Dionisi awards the away team a throw-in.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Atalanta just outside Crotone's area.
Atalanta are coming forward and Johan Mojica gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Crotone.
Crotone push forward at Stadio Ezio Scida and Junior Messias gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atalanta defence.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
